short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Private by Design, A SundayPyjamas Product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension provides an enhanced browsing experience by blocking specific URLs associated with intrusive advertisements and tracking scripts. The following URLs are targeted for blocking:

://.doubleclick.net/*
://.googleadservices.com/*
://.googlesyndication.com/*
://.google-analytics.com/*
://creative.ak.fbcdn.net/
://.adbrite.com/*
://.exponential.com/*
://.quantserve.com/*
://.scorecardresearch.com/*
://.zedo.com/*
By utilizing the declarativeNetRequest API, our extension efficiently blocks these URLs, resulting in a faster and cleaner browsing experience. Protect your privacy and enjoy a more streamlined online environment with our reliable ad and tracking blocker extension. Rest assured, we prioritize user privacy and do not collect any personally identifiable information. Elevate your browsing experience today and enjoy a safer, more enjoyable web.

Do share your feedback on sundaypyjamas@gmail.com
